mapper.sql: id as id , url as url , orderNum as orderNum , parentId as parentId , number as number , longNumber as longNumber , name as name , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , description as description , modelId as modelId , bizModelName as bizModelName
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mubs_resource ( url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{url}, #{orderNum}, #{parentId}, #{number}, #{longNumber}, #{name}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description}, #{modelId}, #{bizModelName} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO mubs_resource ( url, orderNum, parentId, number, longNumber, name, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description, modelId, bizModelName ) VALUES ( #{map.url}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.parentId}, #{map.number}, #{map.longNumber}, #{map.name}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description}, #{map.modelId}, #{map.bizModelName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_resource
url = #{url},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
parentId = #{parentId},
number = #{number},
longNumber = #{longNumber},
name = #{name},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
modelId = #{modelId},
bizModelName = #{bizModelName},
WHERE id = #{id}

modelId = #{map.modelId},
bizModelName = #{map.bizModelName},

UPDATE mubs_resource
url = #{update.url},
orderNum = #{update.orderNum},
parentId = #{update.parentId},
number = #{update.number},

name = #{update.name},

lastModDate = #{update.lastModDate},
description = #{update.description},
modelId = #{update.modelId},
bizModelName = #{update.bizModelName},
${nativeSql}
